content.question: The use of the steel-frame construction method in his Carson, Pirie, Scott and Company Building enabled Louis Sullivan to

choices.label: include load-bearing metal elements as features of the ground-floor facade
incorporate cantilevered balconies that dramatically extend into the surrounding space
reduce the number of load-bearing walls and significantly increase the size of the windows
create a streamlined design for the facade of the building without additional ornamentation

content.answer: reduce the number of load-bearing walls and significantly increase the size of the windows
